faq.title: Flux Kontext AI - Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our Flux Kontext AI platform and its powerful image generation features.
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our Flux Kontext AI platform and its powerful image generation features.

items.question: What is Flux Kontext AI?
items.answer: Flux Kontext AI is an advanced image generation platform that uses cutting-edge artificial intelligence to create stunning images from text descriptions, edit existing images, and process multiple images simultaneously.

items.question: How does text-to-image generation work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your text description and generates high-quality images using advanced Flux Pro and Max models. Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI creates professional-grade images in seconds.

items.question: Can I edit existing images with Flux Kontext?
items.answer: Yes! Our platform supports image editing through natural language instructions. Upload an image and describe the changes you want, and our AI will apply those modifications professionally.

items.question: What image formats and sizes are supported?
items.answer: Flux Kontext AI supports multiple aspect ratios including 1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:2, and 21:9. You can export images in JPEG and PNG formats at high resolution for professional use.

items.question: How many images can I generate at once?
items.answer: You can generate up to 4 images simultaneously with our multi-image processing feature. This allows you to explore different variations of your concept efficiently.

items.question: What makes Flux Kontext different from other AI image generators?
items.answer: Flux Kontext stands out with its advanced Flux Pro and Max models, professional image editing capabilities, multi-image processing, and flexible aspect ratio support all in one seamless platform.

items.question: Are there any usage limits or restrictions?
items.answer: Usage depends on your plan and API limits. Our platform includes safety controls and content filtering to ensure responsible AI image generation while maintaining creative freedom.

items.question: Can I use generated images commercially?
items.answer: Yes, images generated through Flux Kontext AI can typically be used for commercial purposes. Please review the specific terms of service and licensing agreements for detailed usage rights.

interior.title: Interior Render Generator
interior.description: Upload a photo, sketch, or 3D model of an interior space. Choose a similarity level to match creative needs. Describe your desired room environment with a prompt (e.g., ‘modern living room, cozy ambiance’). Select room type and style. Adjust render performance for speed or quality.

modify.title: Pixel-Perfect Edits, Instantly
modify.description: Effortlessly handle last-minute client revisions. Select any area of your final rendering and modify it with a simple text command

night-scene.title: Perfect Night Renders, Zero Setup
